title: Half Baked Ideas
synopsis: Practising PKM as a flowing series of half-baked ideas can encourage innovation and reduce the feeling that our exposed knowledge has to be ‘executive presentation perfect’ [http://jarche.com/2015/03/innovation-means-learning-at-work/ blog]
